title: PRYNNE – Apology to an Ex Lover
content:
Love this debut single from newcomer PRYNNE.

A self-described ‘beach soul’ from New Zealand now living in London, Apology to an Ex Lover is emotionally honest and all the more endearing for it, almost feeling like PRYNNE is penning an open letter to a romance lost. With the stark lyrics layered over the top of subtle yet elegant atmospherics, it’s an impactful and expansive first step. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
